Title: Secondo
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Angelina Burnett, Bryan Fuller, Steve Lightfoot
Actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Hugh Dancy, Caroline Dhavernas, Gillian Anderson
Plot: Will travels to Lithuania where he gains a new ally in his search for Hannibal Lecter while Jack Crawford makes his way to Italy with some searching of his own
